long_description: With an integrated top plate, the Topeak Explorer MTX Rack allows quick mounting of specialty Topeak trunk bags. QuickTrack(TM) mounting system allows easy and secure attachment to Topeak MTX-series trunk bags; just slide it on and it locks in place. 6061-T6 aluminum construction with 6061-T6 aluminum bracket, hollow aluminum tubes and stainless-steel hardware make it strong and lightweight. Integrated top fender offers protection from splashes. One size fits all frames; 26", 27.5"(650b) & 700c wheels.
short_description: With an integrated top plate, the Topeak Explorer MTX Rack allows quick mounting of specialty Topeak trunk bags.
